testcase.classname: As a user, I want to reach the pages I want by using the redirect icons of the site I shop on.
testcase.name: The user accesses the relevant pages through the redirection icons.
testcase.system-out: * Go to "url"...............................................................passed * Clicks the Login buttonLink on the home page..............................passed * Login by entering valid "customerEmail" and "password" on the SignIn page..passed * Verify that the body redirect buttons "Playstore","Appstore","Home","NewProductDeals","AboutUs","Blog","Contact" are working..passed
